SHIPPING & DELIVERY

We currently ship to all areas within Bangladesh in association with our official delivery partners. You can avail Home Delivery in almost all the city areas; in fact in upazilla areas in some specific districts. We along-with our delivery partners are continuously working to enlarge our coverage day-by-day.

SHIPPING TIME

Our estimated delivery schedule is 3-5 days [maximum] for inside Dhaka areas. It'll take 5-7 days [maximum] for outside Dhaka areas. Out of stock items are expected to be delivered according to the time duration that are committed on the time of Order Confirmation by our delivery team

DELIVERY PARTNER

We always try to ensure the safest as well as on time delivery of the parcels. We've been delivering the parcels in association with our official delivery partners: Pathao, Steadfast, eCourier, RedX, Delivery Tiger, Now.

SHIPPING COST

Flat Rate: 60 Taka [Inside Dhaka] ~ 120 Taka [Outside Dhaka]; Flat Rate: 120 Taka [Dhaka Suburb Areas]; Express Delivery: 200 Taka [Inside Dhaka]

Mattress: 500 Taka [Inside Dhaka] ~ 1000 Taka [Outside Dhaka]

FREE SHIPPING

You can avail FREE Shipping on all Orders over 5000 Taka. FREE Shipping is also eligible for Pickup From Store Orders. ** Mattress items will remain excluded from FREE Shipping policy.
